sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-container grid-list-md fluid>
		<v-layout wrap>
			<v-flex xs12 sm4 md3 v-for="pet in dogs" :key="pet.breed">
        <app-dog item="pet" @addToFavorites="addToFavorites"></app-dog>
      </v-flex>
		</v-layout>
	</v-container>
</template>
<script>
import Dog from '../components/item.vue';
import {Dogs} from "../data/dogs";
import axios from 'axios';
//base URL that we'll be calling
axios.defaults.baseURL = 'https://dog.ceo/api';
import { mapActions } from 'vuex';

export default {
  components: {
  appDog: Dog,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      dogs: Dogs
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.$store.dispatch("clearItems");
    const linksArray = this.dogs.map(
      dog => "/breed/" + dog.breed + "/images/random"
    );
    axios.all(linksArray.map(link => axios.get(link)))
    .then(
      axios.spread((...res) => {
        this.dogs.forEach((dog, index) => {
          dog.img = res[index].data.message;
        });
      })
    );
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions(["addToFavorites"])
  }

 };
</script>

<style scoped>
	p {
		margin: 0;
	}
</style>
